Karl Wright wrote:
.....
>
> The only issue for the other changes we've made is that it's hard to
> peel out just one at a time. I trust you don't want 3-4 features all
> submitted in one go?
>





One at a time would be better.  Tracking interleaved features can make 
for time-consuming puzzles.   But if its hard extricating the one from 
the other, make the clumps small as you can and we'll get them in.

Here's the extant issues carrying your old contrib. payloads.  Update 
them with new patches and suggested tests where it makes sense (Or, let 
us know if some should be closed):

http://sourceforge.net/tracker/index.php?func=detail&aid=1448971&group_id=73833&atid=539102
http://sourceforge.net/tracker/index.php?func=detail&aid=1477811&group_id=73833&atid=539102
http://sourceforge.net/tracker/index.php?func=detail&aid=1477814&group_id=73833&atid=539102
http://sourceforge.net/tracker/index.php?func=detail&aid=1388295&group_id=73833&atid=539102

Thanks Karl,
St.Ack
